Class NtcipPoller

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.comm.ThreadedPoller
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.comm.ntcip.NtcipPoller
All Implemented Interfaces:
AlarmPoller, DevicePoller, DMSPoller, GpsPoller, LCSPoller, SamplePoller, WeatherPoller
public class NtcipPoller extends ThreadedPoller implements AlarmPoller, DMSPoller, GpsPoller, LCSPoller, SamplePoller, WeatherPoller
NTCIP Poller
Author:
Douglas Lau, John L. Stanley, Michael Darter
